text: The 2013-14 Red Bull Salzburg season was the 81st season in club history. Red Bull Salzburg finished the season as champions of the Bundesliga and the ÖFB- Cup. In Europe, Salzburg where knocked out of the Champions League by Fenerbahçe in the Third Qualifying Round, dropping into the Europa League. They reached the Round of 16 before defeat to Basel. ==Squad== 2013/14 * Goalkeepers: 1 Eddie Gustafsson (1/0), 20 Thomas Dähne (0/0), 31 Péter Gulácsi (31/0) 33 Alexander Walke (4/0), * Defenders: 5 Andre Ramalho (33/5) 6 Christian Schwegler (19/0), 8 Florian Klein (23/1), 15 Franz Schiemer (13/1), 17 Andreas Ulmer (30/2), 25 Isaac Vorsah (0/0), 29 Rodnei (8/0), 36 Martin Hinteregger (32/2), * Midfielders: 10 Sadio Mane (33/13), 13 Stefan Ilsanker (32/4), 14 Valon Berisha (32/5), 18 Dušan Švento (21/2), 21 Taxiarchis Fountas (0/0) 22 Stefan Hierländer (18/1), 23 Robert Zulj (10/1), 24 Christoph Leitgeb (22/1), 37 Valentino Lazaro (11/2), 39 Georg Teigl (6/0), , 44 Kevin Kampl (33/9) * Forwards:19 Yordy Reyna (4/0), 26 Jonatan Soriano (28/31), 27 Alan (29/26) * Coaching staff: Roger Schmidt (Headcoach), Oliver Glasner, Thomas Letsch (Assistance coaches), Herbert Ilsanker (Goalkeepercoach) FC Salzburg Wiki ==Matches== Austria Soccer ==Table== Team M W D L Goals Points 1\.
